          <title>
            <string language="en">Electrolysis of molten aluminium oxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrolyse des flüssigen Aluminiumoxyds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Électrolyse d'oxyde d'aluminium fondu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Electrolysis do óxido de alumínio derretido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elettrolisi dell'ossido di alluminio fuso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρόλυση του λειωμένου οξειδίου αλουμινίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Electrólisis del óxido de aluminio fundido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates an experimental set-up  to demonstrate electrolysis of molten aluminium oxide which produces molten aluminium.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrolysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molten aluminium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molten aluminium oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht eine 
experimentelle Installation, um Elektrolyse des flüssigen 
Aluminiumoxyds zu zeigen, das flüssiges Aluminium produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre une installation 
expérimentale pour démontrer l'électrolyse de l'oxyde d'aluminium 
fondu qui produit l'aluminium fondu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra uma instalação 
experimental para demonstrar o electrolysis do óxido de alumínio 
derretido que produz o alumínio derretido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una messa a punto 
sperimentale per dimostrare l'elettrolisi dell'ossido di alluminio 
fuso che produce l'alluminio fuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί μια πειραματική οργάνωση 
για να καταδείξει την ηλεκτρόλυση του λειωμένου οξειδίου 
αλουμινίου που παράγει το λειωμένο αλουμίνιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una disposición 
experimental para demostrar electrólisis del óxido de aluminio 
fundido que produce el aluminio fundido.</string>
          </description>
